summary: Tales of the Night weaves together six exotic fables each unfolding in a unique locale, from Tibet, to medieval Europe, to the Land of the Dead. From the imagination of internationally renowned animator Michel Ocelot.
cast: Julien Béramis|Marine Griset|Michel Elias|Olivier Claverie|Isabelle Guiard|Yves Barsacq|Legrand Bemba-Debert|Fatoumata Diawara|Fabrice Daudet Grazaï|Sabine Pakora|Gérard Diby|Umban Gomez de Kset|Firmine Richard|Olivia Brunaux|Serge Feuillard|Michel Ocelot|Louise Rossignon|Christophe Rossignon|Jo Wyatt
title: Los cuentos de la noche
